title: VR-Based Embodied Learning Program for Enhancing Language Proficiency at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and basic VR device operation experience
context.additional_context: Experiential language training environment using learners' own VR devices (BYOD): developing embodied language skills through real-world simulations (interviews, presentations, negotiations, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can achieve 80% accuracy in situational language expression through three or more role-play simulations in VR environments
Learners can naturally implement physical responses (gestures, facial expressions) in language use at over 70% proficiency through embodied learning activities
Learners can improve their language fluency scores (speaking speed, lexical diversity) by 25% compared to the start of the course through VR-based formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
